# SignatureDrop.getClaimTransaction() method

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
>
> Use `contract.erc721.claim.prepare(...args)` instead

Construct a claim transaction without executing it. This is useful for estimating the gas cost of a claim transaction, overriding transaction options and having fine grained control over the transaction execution.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getClaimTransaction(destinationAddress: string, quantity: BigNumberish, options?: ClaimOptions): Promise<Transaction>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter          | Type                                  | Description  |
| ------------------ | ------------------------------------- | ------------ |
| destinationAddress | string                                |              |
| quantity           | BigNumberish                          |              |
| options            | [ClaimOptions](./sdk.claimoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Transaction](./sdk.transaction.md)&gt;
